text: For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
The Lord is my shepherd, I lack nothing.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
The Lord is my light and my salvation—whom shall I fear?
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him.
Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end.
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace.
Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.
Let all that you do be done in love.
If God is for us, who can be against us?
He gives strength to the weary and increases the power of the weak.
So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
With God all things are possible.
The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.
Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
For we walk by faith, not by sight.
And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus.
The righteous cry out, and the Lord hears them; he delivers them from all their troubles.
We love because he first loved us.
Now faith is confidence in what we hope for and assurance about what we do not see.
If you declare with your mouth, 'Jesus is Lord,' and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved.
He has made everything beautiful in its time.
Come to me, all you who are weary and burdened, and I will give you rest.
As for me and my household, we will serve the Lord.
The Lord is good, a refuge in times of trouble. He cares for those who trust in him.
Draw near to God, and he will draw near to you.
He will never leave you nor forsake you.
I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go; I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of the heavenly lights.
You are my rock and my fortress; for your name's sake you lead me and guide me.
Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father in heaven.
No weapon forged against you will prevail, and you will refute every tongue that accuses you.
My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
You will find rest for your souls.
Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself.
The mind governed by the flesh is death, but the mind governed by the Spirit is life and peace.
Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
In the morning, Lord, you hear my voice; in the morning I lay my requests before you and wait expectantly.
For God did not give us a spirit of timidity, but a spirit of power, of love and of self-discipline.
The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you.
Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.
He who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do.
But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
When you pass through the waters, I will be with you; and when you pass through the rivers, they will not sweep over you.
The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.
You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt loses its saltiness, how can it be made salty again?
The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love.
The Lord is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him.
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
Trust in the Lord and do good; dwell in the land and enjoy safe pasture.
Consider it pure joy, my brothers and sisters, whenever you face trials of many kinds.
The joy of the Lord is your strength.
This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
Seek the Lord and his strength; seek his presence continually.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works.
Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.
Blessed is the one who perseveres under trial because, having stood the test, that person will receive the crown of life that the Lord has promised to those who love him.
Do not be afraid, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.
The Lord is my strength and my song; he has given me victory.
Let us hold unswervingly to the hope we profess, for he who promised is faithful.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
Come near to God and he will come near to you.
For nothing will be impossible with God.
He will wipe every tear from their eyes.
God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God, and God in them.
Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts, since as members of one body you were called to peace.
Do not let your hearts be troubled. You believe in God; believe also in me.
The Lord is righteous in all his ways and faithful in all he does.
I sought the Lord, and he answered me; he delivered me from all my fears.
But the Lord is faithful, and he will strengthen you and protect you from the evil one.
The Lord your God is in your midst, a mighty one who will save; he will rejoice over you with gladness.
Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
No eye has seen, no ear has heard, and no mind has imagined what God has prepared for those who love him.
Whoever dwells in the secret place of the Most High will rest in the shadow of the Almighty.
The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
He has shown you, O mortal, what is good. And what does the Lord require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.
For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
In your anger do not sin: Do not let the sun go down while you are still angry.
As iron sharpens iron, so one person sharpens another.
But the Lord stood with me and gave me strength.
Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
A heart at peace gives life to the body, but envy rots the bones.
He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.
The one who calls you is faithful, and he will do it.
What then shall we say to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us?
Let everything you do be done in love.
It is for freedom that Christ has set us free.
Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer.
The Lord will keep you from all harm—he will watch over your life.
The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
He has made everything beautiful in its time.
If you seek him, he will be found by you; but if you forsake him, he will reject you forever.
Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they will be filled.
The Lord is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him.
Each of you should look not only to your own interests, but also to the interests of others.
Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
We love because he first loved us.
Do not conform to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
He who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.
For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
The Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
He has made everything beautiful in its time.
Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, the new creation has come: The old has gone, the new is here!
The Lord your God is with you, the Mighty Warrior who saves.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
Do not be afraid, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
Let all that you do be done in love.
The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing.
In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God, and God in them.
But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
For God has not given us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.
I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
Whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
And we know that in all things God works for the good of those who love him, who have been called according to his purpose.
Let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us, fixing our eyes on Jesus, the pioneer and perfecter of faith.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you hope and a future.
The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works.

The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?

The Lord is my strength and my song; he has become my salvation.
Be still, and know that I am God.
You are my rock and my fortress; for your name’s sake lead me and guide me.
The Lord is compassionate and gracious, slow to anger, abounding in love.
The Lord is good to those whose hope is in him, to the one who seeks him.
This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge.
The one who calls you is faithful, and he will do it.
A friend loves at all times, and a brother is born for a time of adversity.
Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.
The Lord is near to the brokenhearted and saves the crushed in spirit.
Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!
